title: Emergency Pod! Twitter is reportedly building a paid subscription called “Twitter Blue” | E1216
description: Jason shares insights on the Twitter Blue leak (1:40) then breaks down recent product innovations, Twitter's 2021 acquisition spree, and what it all means (15:05). Check out the pod notes: https://bitly.com/e1216notes
